AccessibilityEnum.title: AccessibilityEnum
AccessibilityEnum.description: Information on accessibility and facilities for persons with disabilities.

Amenities.title: Amenities
Amenities.description: Amenities such as the facility (or a facility in the surrounding) being roofed or illuminated.

illuminated.title: illuminated
illuminated.description: The facility is illuminated during darkness.

roofed.title: roofed
roofed.description: The facility has got a roof.

illuminatedRechargingParkingNearby.title: illuminatedRechargingParkingNearby
illuminatedRechargingParkingNearby.description: There is a illuminated recharging or refuelling parking location in the immediate surrounding of the facility.

roofedRechargingParkingNearby.title: roofedRechargingParkingNearby
roofedRechargingParkingNearby.description: There is a roofed recharging or refuelling parking location in the immediate surrounding of the facility.

AmountOfMoney.title: AmountOfMoney
AmountOfMoney.description: A monetary value expressed to two decimal places.

AnOrganisation.title: AnOrganisation
AnOrganisation.description: An organisation. It can be specialised to be referenceable.

lastUpdated.title: lastUpdated
lastUpdated.description: The date/time at which this information was last updated.

legalName.title: legalName
legalName.description: The legal name of the organisation.

linkToGeneralInformation.title: linkToGeneralInformation
linkToGeneralInformation.description: An internet address from where further relevant information about this organisation may be obtained.

linkToLogo.title: linkToLogo
linkToLogo.description: An internet address from where the logo of this organisation may be obtained.

linkToWebform.title: linkToWebform
linkToWebform.description: An internet address pointing to a webform, which people can use to send messages to this organisation.

available24hours.title: available24hours
available24hours.description: Specifies if the availability is 24 hours a day. If omitted, this information is unknown or heterogeneous.

responsibility.title: responsibility
responsibility.description: Specification of services or other duties the organisation is responsible for.

publishingAgreement.title: publishingAgreement
publishingAgreement.description: Indication whether the organisation accepted publishing its information.

type.title: type
type.description: Information whether the organisation in question belongs to the public or private sector.

nationalOrganisationNumber.title: nationalOrganisationNumber
nationalOrganisationNumber.description: The national organisation number in the specified national register, if applicable.

nationalRegister.title: nationalRegister
nationalRegister.description: A national register where the organisation is registered.

vatIdentificationNumber.title: vatIdentificationNumber
vatIdentificationNumber.description: The VAT identification number of the organisation.

generalTimeValidity.title: generalTimeValidity
generalTimeValidity.description: Specification of a time validity, for which this organisation information is valid in general. This is not a specification of the operating hours as such.

subOrganisation.title: subOrganisation
subOrganisation.description: An organisation that is subordinated to its parent organisation, defined likewise by the Organisation model structure.

AnOrganisationG.title: AnOrganisationG
AnOrganisationG.description: Only one of the properties shall be used in an instance.

AvailabilityEnum.title: AvailabilityEnum
AvailabilityEnum.description: An enumeration which states if something is available or not.

ClosureInformation.title: ClosureInformation
ClosureInformation.description: Information about temporary or permanent closure.

permananentlyClosed.title: permananentlyClosed
permananentlyClosed.description: Permanently closed, i.e. it is not intended to open again.

temporarilyClosed.title: temporarilyClosed
temporarilyClosed.description: Temporarily closed for an unspecified period.

closedFrom.title: closedFrom
closedFrom.description: Permanently or temporarily closed from the given date on. May lie in the future - in this case the scene is not closed now.

temporarilyClosedUntil.title: temporarilyClosedUntil
temporarilyClosedUntil.description: Temporarily closed until the given date (i.e. closure still includes this date).

language.title: language
language.description: Language(s) that are supported via telephone or mail.

telephoneNumber.title: telephoneNumber
telephoneNumber.description: Telephone number, which can be a general number or the number of a specific contact person.

faxNumber.title: faxNumber
faxNumber.description: Fax number, which can be a general number or the number of a specific contact person.

eMail.title: eMail
eMail.description: E-Mail address, which can be a general mail address or the mail address of a specific contact person.

ContactInformationG.title: ContactInformationG
ContactInformationG.description: Only one of the properties shall be used in an instance.

language.title: language
language.description: Language(s) that are supported via telephone or mail.

telephoneNumber.title: telephoneNumber
telephoneNumber.description: Telephone number, which can be a general number or the number of a specific contact person.

faxNumber.title: faxNumber
faxNumber.description: Fax number, which can be a general number or the number of a specific contact person.

eMail.title: eMail
eMail.description: E-Mail address, which can be a general mail address or the mail address of a specific contact person.

name.title: name
name.description: The (last) name of the contact person

firstName.title: firstName
firstName.description: The first name of the contact person

title.title: title
title.description: Title information of the contact person.

position.title: position
position.description: The position of the contact person

CurrencyCode.title: CurrencyCode
CurrencyCode.description: Three letter code defining the currency according to ISO 4217:2015 (e.g. EUR for Euro).

Dimension.title: Dimension
Dimension.description: A component that provides dimension information. Especially for multi-storey buildings, the usable area might be larger than the product from its length and width.

usableArea.title: usableArea
usableArea.description: The area measured in square metres, that is available for some specific purpose.

ExternalIdentifier.title: ExternalIdentifier
ExternalIdentifier.description: An external (maybe national) identifier, optional with its specific type.

typeOfIdentifier.title: typeOfIdentifier
typeOfIdentifier.description: The type of identifier expressed as enumeration, which should be extended project specific.

otherTypeOfIdentifier.title: otherTypeOfIdentifier
otherTypeOfIdentifier.description: The type of identifier expressed as string.

FacilityG.title: FacilityG
FacilityG.description: Only one of the properties shall be used in an instance.

FacilityObjectG.title: FacilityObjectG
FacilityObjectG.description: Only one of the properties shall be used in an instance.

Image.title: Image
Image.description: An image, with encoded data and identification of format

imageFormat.title: imageFormat
imageFormat.description: Identifies the image format of the associated image data

OpenAllHours.title: OpenAllHours
OpenAllHours.description: Open or available all the time (24/7)

OperatingHoursByReference.title: OperatingHoursByReference
OperatingHoursByReference.description: Operating hours information that is addressed via a reference.

operatingHoursReference.title: operatingHoursReference
operatingHoursReference.description: The reference to an operating hours specification.

operatingHoursTableReference.title: operatingHoursTableReference
operatingHoursTableReference.description: Operation hours table in question defined by a reference.

OperatingHoursG.title: OperatingHoursG
OperatingHoursG.description: Only one of the properties shall be used in an instance.

OperatingHoursSpecification.title: OperatingHoursSpecification
OperatingHoursSpecification.description: A specification of operating hours (e.g. for a parking site, a service facility, an access or the availability for equipment).

lastUpdated.title: lastUpdated
lastUpdated.description: The date/time at which this information was last updated.

label.title: label
label.description: A label, name or identifier for this operating hours specification.

operatingAllYear.title: operatingAllYear
operatingAllYear.description: The facility or organisation is not closed on a seasonal base.

urlLinkAddress.title: urlLinkAddress
urlLinkAddress.description: A Uniform Resource Locator (URL) address pointing to a resource available on the Internet from where further relevant information may be obtained.

overallPeriod.title: overallPeriod
overallPeriod.description: The specification of operating hours by an overall period combined with valid or exceptional periods.

OrganisationByReference.title: OrganisationByReference
OrganisationByReference.description: Organisation information that is based on a reference

organisationReference.title: organisationReference
organisationReference.description: Organisation information provided by a reference.

organisationTableReference.title: organisationTableReference
organisationTableReference.description: Organisation table in question defined by a reference.

generalTimeValidity.title: generalTimeValidity
generalTimeValidity.description: Specification of a time validity, for which this organisation information is valid in general. This is not a specification of the operating hours as such.

OrganisationG.title: OrganisationG
OrganisationG.description: Only one of the properties shall be used in an instance.

OrganisationUnit.title: OrganisationUnit
OrganisationUnit.description: A unit within the organisation, which has got seperate location, operating hours, address and/or contacts.

name.title: name
name.description: A name for this organisation unit

function.title: function
function.description: Functions this unit is responsible for or a specific type, e.g. headquarter or sales

paymentMode.title: paymentMode
paymentMode.description: Defines the timing of the parking or other mobility related payment

otherPaymentMeans.title: otherPaymentMeans
otherPaymentMeans.description: Other means of payment that are available.

otherBrandsAccepted.title: otherBrandsAccepted
otherBrandsAccepted.description: Further accepted brands for payment cards.

PaymentModeEnum.title: PaymentModeEnum
PaymentModeEnum.description: Details of when payment is required.

ReferenceableOrganisation.title: ReferenceableOrganisation
ReferenceableOrganisation.description: A versioned identifiable organisation that can be referenced.

lastUpdated.title: lastUpdated
lastUpdated.description: The date/time at which this information was last updated.

legalName.title: legalName
legalName.description: The legal name of the organisation.

linkToGeneralInformation.title: linkToGeneralInformation
linkToGeneralInformation.description: An internet address from where further relevant information about this organisation may be obtained.

linkToLogo.title: linkToLogo
linkToLogo.description: An internet address from where the logo of this organisation may be obtained.

linkToWebform.title: linkToWebform
linkToWebform.description: An internet address pointing to a webform, which people can use to send messages to this organisation.

available24hours.title: available24hours
available24hours.description: Specifies if the availability is 24 hours a day. If omitted, this information is unknown or heterogeneous.

responsibility.title: responsibility
responsibility.description: Specification of services or other duties the organisation is responsible for.

publishingAgreement.title: publishingAgreement
publishingAgreement.description: Indication whether the organisation accepted publishing its information.

type.title: type
type.description: Information whether the organisation in question belongs to the public or private sector.

nationalOrganisationNumber.title: nationalOrganisationNumber
nationalOrganisationNumber.description: The national organisation number in the specified national register, if applicable.

nationalRegister.title: nationalRegister
nationalRegister.description: A national register where the organisation is registered.

vatIdentificationNumber.title: vatIdentificationNumber
vatIdentificationNumber.description: The VAT identification number of the organisation.

generalTimeValidity.title: generalTimeValidity
generalTimeValidity.description: Specification of a time validity, for which this organisation information is valid in general. This is not a specification of the operating hours as such.

subOrganisation.title: subOrganisation
subOrganisation.description: An organisation that is subordinated to its parent organisation, defined likewise by the Organisation model structure.

ServiceFacilityTypeEnum.title: ServiceFacilityTypeEnum
ServiceFacilityTypeEnum.description: A service facility. In distinction to equipment, a service is usually manned.

SquareMetres.title: SquareMetres
SquareMetres.description: A value of area expressed in units of square metres.

SupplementalEquipment.title: SupplementalEquipment
SupplementalEquipment.description: One type of  supplemental equipment, which is available on some site, for example on a rest area.

alias.title: alias
alias.description: An alternative name for this facility.

lastUpdated.title: lastUpdated
lastUpdated.description: Information on the time when the information has been updated the last time

accessibility.title: accessibility
accessibility.description: Information on accessibility and facilities for persons with disabilities.

availability.title: availability
availability.description: Specifies whether the supplemental facility is available or not. Note that this is no dynamic information!

quantity.title: quantity
quantity.description: Number of the supplemental facility (e.g. number of toilets, restaurants, park & ride places, etc.) with respect to given restrictions. Dynamic overridable.

regularlyCleaned.title: regularlyCleaned
regularlyCleaned.description: Indicates whether the supplemental facility is cleaned on a regular basis.

applicableForUser.title: applicableForUser
applicableForUser.description: Limitation to a set of special users.

nearby.title: nearby
nearby.description: If true, the Supplemental Facility is not located on the site of the orignal facility but nearby. They must not necessarly belong together.

informationWebsite.title: informationWebsite
informationWebsite.description: URL of some internet site with additional information.

photoUrl.title: photoUrl
photoUrl.description: Specifies a URL at which a photo of the facility or its surrounding can be found.

photo.title: photo
photo.description: A binary photo of the facility or its surrounding.

helpdesk.title: helpdesk
helpdesk.description: A helpdesk service for the facility.

applicableForVehicles.title: applicableForVehicles
applicableForVehicles.description: A set of vehicles, for which this facility is appropriate, specified by its characteristics.

SupplementalFacilityG.title: SupplementalFacilityG
SupplementalFacilityG.description: Only one of the properties shall be used in an instance.

SupplementalServiceFacility.title: SupplementalServiceFacility
SupplementalServiceFacility.description: One type of supplemental service facility. You can specify the number of this service facility type (e.g. 5 restaurants) as well as the number of subitems (e.g. 200 restaurant places).

alias.title: alias
alias.description: An alternative name for this facility.

lastUpdated.title: lastUpdated
lastUpdated.description: Information on the time when the information has been updated the last time

accessibility.title: accessibility
accessibility.description: Information on accessibility and facilities for persons with disabilities.

availability.title: availability
availability.description: Specifies whether the supplemental facility is available or not. Note that this is no dynamic information!

quantity.title: quantity
quantity.description: Number of the supplemental facility (e.g. number of toilets, restaurants, park & ride places, etc.) with respect to given restrictions. Dynamic overridable.

regularlyCleaned.title: regularlyCleaned
regularlyCleaned.description: Indicates whether the supplemental facility is cleaned on a regular basis.

applicableForUser.title: applicableForUser
applicableForUser.description: Limitation to a set of special users.

nearby.title: nearby
nearby.description: If true, the Supplemental Facility is not located on the site of the orignal facility but nearby. They must not necessarly belong together.

numberOfSubitems.title: numberOfSubitems
numberOfSubitems.description: The quantity of subitems to this service facility type, e.g. the total number of restaurant places or fuel dispensers etc.

distanceFromOriginFacility.title: distanceFromOriginFacility
distanceFromOriginFacility.description: Approximate distance (given in metres) between this supplemental facility and some origin facility to which it is clearly related (typically a larger facility, e.g. a parking site).

informationWebsite.title: informationWebsite
informationWebsite.description: URL of some internet site with additional information.

photoUrl.title: photoUrl
photoUrl.description: Specifies a URL at which a photo of the facility or its surrounding can be found.

photo.title: photo
photo.description: A binary photo of the facility or its surrounding.

helpdesk.title: helpdesk
helpdesk.description: A helpdesk service for the facility.

applicableForVehicles.title: applicableForVehicles
applicableForVehicles.description: A set of vehicles, for which this facility is appropriate, specified by its characteristics.

TimeZone.title: TimeZone
TimeZone.description: Identifies a time zone by specifying the difference to UTC in hours and minutes, as defined in ISO 8601.

TypeOfIdentifierEnum.title: TypeOfIdentifierEnum
TypeOfIdentifierEnum.description: An empty enumeration, which should be project-specifically extended to provide type of external identifiers.

UndefinedOperatingHours.title: UndefinedOperatingHours
UndefinedOperatingHours.description: There are no operating hours specified.

UndefinedOrganisation.title: UndefinedOrganisation
UndefinedOrganisation.description: The organisation for the specified association end (within the specified validity if applicable) is not defined.

generalTimeValidity.title: generalTimeValidity
generalTimeValidity.description: Specification of a time validity, for which this organisation information is valid in general. This is not a specification of the operating hours as such.

UnknownOperatingHours.title: UnknownOperatingHours
UnknownOperatingHours.description: The operating hours are not known.

UnknownOrganisation.title: UnknownOrganisation
UnknownOrganisation.description: The organisation for the specified association end (within the specified validity if applicable) is unknown.

generalTimeValidity.title: generalTimeValidity
generalTimeValidity.description: Specification of a time validity, for which this organisation information is valid in general. This is not a specification of the operating hours as such.

UserTypeEnum.title: UserTypeEnum
UserTypeEnum.description: Types of different users, for example used in the context of parking.
